Target: charges taken in the year - earlier period

Source: In the 1989 period also , interest expense and tax rates were lower than a year ago

text: The quarter - to - quarter comparison was also enhanced by charges taken in the year - earlier period , including $ 11 million related to the modernization of a pulp and newsprint mill in Alabama . In the 1989 period also , interest expense and tax rates were lower than a year ago .
